thread.title: Trump’s New Year’s Resolution Is To Keep A Central Campaign Promise
thread.title_full: Trump’s New Year’s Resolution Is To Keep A Central Campaign Promise

author: Randy DeSoto
title: Trump’s New Year’s Resolution Is To Keep A Central Campaign Promise
text:
SYLVESTER STALLONE (aka "Rocky") GAVE THIS TO #PresidentTrump LAST NIGHT. 
Says it all… HAPPY NEW YEAR ! pic.twitter.com/ulJLsQoL0e 
— Dr. C.A.OLMO ☆🇺🇸 (@realDrOlmo) January 1, 2017 
The message was written on top of an article about the ad below that drew on the words of Rocky Balboa about not making excuses, but taking the hits life gives and keep moving forward. 
Trump boldly proclaims in the ad: “We are going to make America great again!” 
Trump promised at his party that he would be back to work on Monday, noting his incoming administration is “picking a lot of great people for our government.” 
As reported by Western Journalism , Vice President-elect Mike Pence told Congress to “buckle up” and get ready for a very vigorous launch of the Trump administration. 
Pence stated, “Right out of the box, you are going to see our president-elect get out that pen and repeal every single unconstitutional executive order that Barack Obama signed into law.” 
Other items on the agenda include repealing Obamacare, passing tax reform, rolling back red tape, replacing Justice Antonin Scalia on the Supreme Court, and restoring the nation’s military might. 
The vice president-elect believes the American people have given Trump a mandate to change the nation’s course and make it great again. 
He said that Trump won “30 of 50 states, more counties won than [any Republican candidate] since Ronald Reagan. This is an historic victory.” What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
